apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this romantic emoji portrays a tender kiss between a man with a medium-dark skin tone and a woman with a light skin tone, their faces softly shaded with Apple's characteristic glossy, 3D effect. Subtle rosy cheeks and gentle expressions convey deep affection and connection, illuminated by realistic lighting. This emoji on Apple devices is a beautiful way to express love, romance, and intimate sentiment in messages.
